title: How to retrieve all the books I've read on Wattpad ever - Quora

response.answer_text: When I read a book and I find it great I check out the author's profile to get more so… If you remember the author's name search him or herTags that you readWhen you check out a book scroll down to “similar stories” . Most times we tend to read books along the same topic lineSearch via genre…most times people read a certain genre like maybe “historical fiction” you'd see alot you've already read on that genre with new books scattered around…mainly because people tend to read books with more views votes and comments and so these books would be at the topIf you vote or comment on books… on the General feed page that recommend books for you…you'll see something like “because you voted on….” Or “if you loved….you will like…” Things like thatFinally this is not a recovery means but an advice…..use your archive space…archive books you'd love to read over and over again or books you can't wait for the update….maybe the writer is taking a sabbatical… for books like that if an update is eventually made then it would automatically be re added to your library. Another thing you can do is to create a reading list……name it something like “finished and loved” and add books to it….this way even if you remove these books from your personal library you can go on your profile and recover these books from your reading listsOk I think I've spoken too much. Try it..I hope it helps…infact I'm sure it will. ♥

Well, I’ve been on Wattpad for more than 16 months and so far, I’ve never known such a feature that I can help us retrieve the books. You can try these things if you want to find a certain book that you’d read at a point of time. Very tedious thing but yes, you can check your activity and see if you can see something related to it.You can put on tags in the search box. I’ve found many books this way and it’s a lot better than the first one.I know, this was anything but helpful so sorry! :(
